sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均有"确实地，真正地"之意。
means: indeed ： 一般用于肯定或证实对方所说的话，多承接前言，也用来加强或肯定自己说话的语气。
really ： 主要用于强调与事实或现实不相违背，也可表示不快、惊奇或某种含蓄的怀疑。
truly ： 强调客观存在的真实性，没有任何虚假。
actually ： 侧重于实际的事，而不是凭空想象或推测的事。

sentence.Network_en: Yours truly was awoken by a shout: "Ahoy there!"
sentence.Network_cn: 鄙人被一声大喊惊醒：“喂！”

sentence.Network_en: The birth of a live healthy baby is a truly blessed event.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个健康活泼的婴儿的出生真是一件可喜的事情。

sentence.Network_en: Experts agreed that this was a truly sensational performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家们一致认为这的确是一场精彩绝伦的演出。

jx.jx_en_mean: used as a formula for ending a letter
jx.jx_cn_mean: 你真诚的（书信结尾的客套语）

entry.def: You use truly to emphasize that something has all the features or qualities of a particular thing, or is the case to the fullest possible extent.

example.ex: Not all doctors truly understand the reproductive cycle...
example.tran: 并非所有的医生都真正了解生殖周期。

entry.def: You can use truly in order to emphasize your description of something.
You use truly to emphasize that feelings are genuine and sincere.

example.ex: Believe me, Susan, I am truly sorry...
example.tran: 相信我，苏珊，我实在感到抱歉。
他由衷地爱他的孩子们。

entry.def: You can use truly in order to emphasize that what you are saying is true.

example.ex: I truly never minded caring for Rusty…
example.tran: 我真的从不介意照顾拉斯蒂。

example.ex: I do not expect a war between my country and yours. Truly I do not.
example.tran: 我不希望你我两国之间爆发战争。真的不希望。

entry.tran: (用于正式信件末尾)你忠实的
entry.def: You write Yours truly at the end of a formal letter to someone you do not know very well. You write your signature after the words 'Yours truly'.
You can say yours truly as a way of referring to yourself.

example.ex: Yours truly was awoken by a shout: 'Ahoy there!'
example.tran: 鄙人被一声大喊惊醒：“喂！”

means.word_mean: 1. in accordance with truth or fact or reality;

sentences.sentence: "she praised him sincerely for his victory"
"was unfeignedly glad to see his old teacher"
"we are truly sorry for the inconvenience"

means.word_mean: 4. in fact (used as intensifiers or sentence modifiers);

sentences.sentence: "in truth, moral decay hastened the decline of the Roman Empire"

example.en: If nobody else wants that, just ask yours truly.
example.zh: 假如没有别的人要，那就来找鄙人。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tru相信,真实+e→adj.真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]+ful表形容词→adj.相信的, 信任的
tru相信,真实+ly表副词→adv.真实地, 不假
tru相信,真实+ce→相信对方而停战
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
tru相信,真实+ism学术→真实的学术→不言自明的真理
tru相信,真实+th表名词→n.真实,真相;真实性;真理
tru相信,真实+st→n.&v.信任, 信赖
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
en给予+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→给予相信→委托
